params.maxReferralLinks: Maximum number of referral links for an user

params.sender: address of the sender to be rewarded

params._endTime: the end date of the campaign
params._rewardAmount: the reward amount of the campaign
params._startTime: the start date of the campaign

returns._0: the number of referral links used by a sender

params._fundRecipient: the address of the recipient who will receive the funds allocated for this campaign

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newSignerWalletAddress: address of the new backend wallet

returns._0: the address of an verified user at a given index

CampaignAdded(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Triggered when a campaign state has been changed

CampaignFunded(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Triggered when a campaign has been funded

CampaignStateChanged(uint256,uint8).notice: Triggered when a campaign state has been changed

RewardClaimed(address,uint256,address).notice: Triggered when a reward has been claimed

campaignReferralLinks(uint256,address).notice: Returns the number of referral links used by a sender

campaigns(uint256).notice: Returns the details of a campaign

claimReward(address,uint256[],address[],.notice: Allows users to claim the reward for a campaign using a signature

initialize(address,address,address).notice: Used to initialize a new contract

updateSignerWalletAddress(address).notice: Updates the address of the backend wallet

verifiedUsersAt(uint256).notice: Returns the address of an verified user at a given index

verifiedUsersLength().notice: Returns the number of verified users
